title: PM condoles with Jahangir Tareen over death of his brother
content:
LAHORE, Jul 15 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Saturday visited the residence of chief of Istehkam-e-Pakistan Party Jahangir Tareen and condoled over the death of his brother.The prime minister offered fateha for Alamgir Tareen, brother of Jahangir Tareen.He prayed for the elevation of ranks of the departed soul in Jannah and for grant of patience to the bereaved family.
